caption:
What happened when I stopped buying every beauty product on social media and started listening to my own skin ✨️

• I learned most active ingredients aren’t kind to my skin, and actually, I didn’t need them to have ”good” skin 😯

• Settled on a flexible but easy to follow routine - cleanse, serum, moisturise, spf - with extras for those days when I just feel like treating myself 🧖🏻‍♀️

• Found a skincare professional who cares about my needs, not hers, and I see her every quarter 🙏🏼 hey skinpodxlob

• Reaped the benefits of the relatively affordable LED therapy ❣️

• Researched products with harmful ingredients and removed them from my bathroom - I’m looking at you, UK Lash 👀 

• I now stick to brands I know work for me, can relate to, and can rely on - while being open-minded to similar products by other brands 😊

• Can now safely try new products and know immediately when to stop / if they’re not suitable 🙌🏼

• Stopped falling victim to digital marketing when it comes to my skin’s health 🙅🏻‍♀️

• I am mindf | @christinadaydreams #sundayriley
